value.name: Killing of Samuel Luiz - Wikipedia
value.snippet: Samuel Luiz Muñiz, a 24-year-old nursing assistant, was beaten to death in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain, on 3 July 2021. According to several witnesses, including the victim's friends, the crime was motivated by homophobia, which led to country-wide demonstrations in his memory, and in defence of LGBT community.

Luiz was beaten to the point of death in the early hours of July 3, 2021, in A Coruña, Galicia.

value.snippet: Samuel Luiz, 24, was attacked while out with friends in the city of A Coruña in the early hours of Saturday morning after an argument started outside a nightclub. He died later in hospital....

value.name: Killing of Samuel Luiz - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
value.snippet: Samuel Luiz Muñiz was a nursing assistant, who was beaten to death in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain, on 3 July 2021 as a victim of homophobic violence. Samuel Luiz was talking to his friend, Vanessa Gonzalez, when he was attacked at about 2:45 am. After his death, people started doing demonstrations to protest violence against LGBT people.

value.snippet: Just days after LGBTQ + Pride, the Spanish city of La Coruña mourned the murder of 24-year-old Samuel Luiz Muñiz, after being brutally beaten by a group of subjects around three in the morning on Saturday in what has been described as a homophobic assault.
